alert.note: Alert for Clark; Greene; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:02PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN CLARK, NORTHERN GREENE AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 702 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Enon, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Beavercreek, Fairborn, Xenia, Yellow Springs, Wright-Patterson Afb, Cedarville, Enon, South Charleston, Wilberforce, Harmony, Lisbon, South Vienna, South Solon, Donnelsville, Clifton, Green Meadows, Hustead, Selma and Oldtown. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 42 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
